thread.title: Relaxing, family friendly Cape wine land experience
thread.title_full: Relaxing, family friendly Cape wine land experience - Review of Spier Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: 109timothyr
title: Relaxing, family friendly Cape wine land experience
text: Just what my family needed. Comfortable rooms, calm and peaceful environment. From the front desk to the restaurant wait staff, all went to great lengths to ensure my family (including two kids under age 5) felt welcomed and encouraged to explore the property. We will definitely stay again when we return to the area.
